import './post.css'; import { MoreVert } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { Users } from '../../dummyData'; function Post({ post }) { const user = Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId); console.log(user); return (
{user[0].username} {post.date}
{post.desc}
{post.like} people have liked
{post.comment} Comments
); } export default Post;
